name: The Corrupt Pit of Hell
description: My very first attempt at mapping back in December. I'm more of a modder but I found the calling of mapping to be a tough offer to pass up. So I did. Hell has broken through the ground at a small alien colony on Titan. The maintenance crew, unaware at what created the pit, constructed a crude bridge across the pit hell created. Demons have risen from the deep ass hole hell created and killed everyone. A group of juvenile doom players found the area to be a kick ass deathmatch spot. And so it was...
